title: 10 "Perfect" Gifts to Snag ASAP from Macy's Early Black Friday Sale
description: The best deals to grab from Macy's Black Friday sale — including deals on bedding, bath, kitchen, and more. READ MORE...
author: Haley Lyndes
excerpt: The best deals to grab from Macy's Black Friday sale — including deals on bedding, bath, kitchen, and more.
text: DecoratingShoppingWe independently select these products—if you buy from one of our links, we may earn a commission. All prices were accurate at the time of publishing.Credit: Jayme Burrows/StocksyWhy wait for November 29 when Macy’s Early Black Friday Sale is already in full swing? The discounts started rolling out in early November, so you’ve got plenty of time to knock out your holiday shopping without the stress of last-minute scrambling (or navigating Black Friday chaos). With all the amazing deals on everything, including cozy robes, Beats headphones, and even items from Le Creuset, this is the perfect opportunity to get a head start on your gift list.Whether you’ve already started holiday shopping or haven’t begun, the hundreds of thousands of options mean that you’ll definitely find gifts for every single recipient — but the quantity also means that it can be a bit overwhelming to sort through. Luckily, we’ve done the work for you, landing on 10 giftable items that are majorly discounted right now. Keep reading to discover our top picks!1 / 10Macy's$7.99was $20.00This little candy dish couldn’t be more perfect for the holiday season — and it's so affordable! Compact yet sturdy, this Godinger Hershey’s Kiss Dish is a sweet way to display treats and is available in multiple colors to match any decor. Our Commerce Editor Britt loves it. “I spotted it at Macy’s years ago and immediately bought one for myself, then another for my mom that she keeps out year-round," Britt says. "Even my aunt bought one after she saw ours!”2 / 10Macy's$29.99was $100.00Elevate cozy nights in with this luxurious faux fur throw from Christian Siriano. Designed with a chic snow leopard print, it’s supersoft and perfect for draping over a couch or bed. A stylish way to stay warm — it adds a splash of designer chic to any room.3 / 10Macy's$199.99was $285.99Air frying just got a modern makeover with this Fritaire Self-Cleaning Air Fryer Set, available in six colors. The glass bowl even cleans itself — just add soapy water — making it perfect for quick, delicious meals without the mess.5 / 10Macy's$125.80was $148.00Enjoy immersive sound with these Beats Studio Buds! Totally wireless and noise-canceling, they’re perfect for the music lover or podcast enthusiast who’s always on the go. They come in bold red and a few other fun colors, adding a splash of style to anyone’s daily playlist.6 / 10Macy's$329.99was $449.99This KitchenAid Artisan Mixer is a must-have, especially for those who love to bake! The hammered metal bowl is easy on the eyes, and the mixer’s classic red color is truly timeless. With its powerful performance and stunning design, it’s a gift sure to delight anyone who loves creating in the kitchen.7 / 10Macy's$279.95was $430.00For the home chef in your life, this iconic Le Creuset Dutch oven is a game-changer. Its wide design is perfect for family-size stews, roasts, and more, with the quality and vibrant finish that Le Creuset fans love.8 / 10Macy's$39.99was $49.99Bring some green indoors with this Orchid Botanical LEGO set — perfect for plant lovers and builders alike! It’s a fun and unique way to add a splash of floral decor without any watering required. Great as a relaxing project or decor for a home office or shelf!9 / 10Macy's$44.16was $69.00Wrap up in this super plush bathrobe for the ultimate spa-at-home experience. With a warm, soft feel, it’s perfect for lounging in luxury after a hot shower or on a lazy Sunday morning. This unisex robe is a cozy gift that’s sure to make anyone’s day a little more relaxing.10 / 10Macy's$119.99was $299.99Make travel easy and stylish with this Samsonite Spin Tech carry-on! Lightweight and durable, it features spinner wheels that glide effortlessly through busy airports. Designed just for Macy’s, this is the perfect gift for the frequent flier who wants luggage that performs as well as it looks.
html:
• Decorating
  • Shopping

We independently select these products—if you buy from one of our links, we may earn a commission. All prices were accurate at the time of publishing.

Why wait for November 29 when Macy’s Early Black Friday Sale is already in full swing? The discounts started rolling out in early November, so you’ve got plenty of time to knock out your holiday shopping without the stress of last-minute scrambling (or navigating Black Friday chaos). With all the amazing deals on everything, including cozy robes, Beats headphones, and even items from Le Creuset, this is the perfect opportunity to get a head start on your gift list.

Whether you’ve already started holiday shopping or haven’t begun, the hundreds of thousands of options mean that you’ll definitely find gifts for every single recipient — but the quantity also means that it can be a bit overwhelming to sort through. Luckily, we’ve done the work for you, landing on 10 giftable items that are majorly discounted right now. Keep reading to discover our top picks!

1 / 10

Macy's

$7.99

was $20.00

This little candy dish couldn’t be more perfect for the holiday season — and it's so affordable! Compact yet sturdy, this Godinger Hershey’s Kiss Dish is a sweet way to display treats and is available in multiple colors to match any decor. Our Commerce Editor Britt loves it. “I spotted it at Macy’s years ago and immediately bought one for myself, then another for my mom that she keeps out year-round," Britt says. "Even my aunt bought one after she saw ours!”

2 / 10

Macy's

$29.99

was $100.00

Elevate cozy nights in with this luxurious faux fur throw from Christian Siriano. Designed with a chic snow leopard print, it’s supersoft and perfect for draping over a couch or bed. A stylish way to stay warm — it adds a splash of designer chic to any room.

3 / 10

Macy's

$199.99

was $285.99

Air frying just got a modern makeover with this Fritaire Self-Cleaning Air Fryer Set, available in six colors. The glass bowl even cleans itself — just add soapy water — making it perfect for quick, delicious meals without the mess.

5 / 10

Macy's

$125.80

was $148.00

Enjoy immersive sound with these Beats Studio Buds! Totally wireless and noise-canceling, they’re perfect for the music lover or podcast enthusiast who’s always on the go. They come in bold red and a few other fun colors, adding a splash of style to anyone’s daily playlist.

6 / 10

Macy's

$329.99

was $449.99

This KitchenAid Artisan Mixer is a must-have, especially for those who love to bake! The hammered metal bowl is easy on the eyes, and the mixer’s classic red color is truly timeless. With its powerful performance and stunning design, it’s a gift sure to delight anyone who loves creating in the kitchen.

7 / 10

Macy's

$279.95

was $430.00

For the home chef in your life, this iconic Le Creuset Dutch oven is a game-changer. Its wide design is perfect for family-size stews, roasts, and more, with the quality and vibrant finish that Le Creuset fans love.

8 / 10

Macy's

$39.99

was $49.99

Bring some green indoors with this Orchid Botanical LEGO set — perfect for plant lovers and builders alike! It’s a fun and unique way to add a splash of floral decor without any watering required. Great as a relaxing project or decor for a home office or shelf!

9 / 10

Macy's

$44.16

was $69.00

Wrap up in this super plush bathrobe for the ultimate spa-at-home experience. With a warm, soft feel, it’s perfect for lounging in luxury after a hot shower or on a lazy Sunday morning. This unisex robe is a cozy gift that’s sure to make anyone’s day a little more relaxing.

10 / 10

Macy's

$119.99

was $299.99

Make travel easy and stylish with this Samsonite Spin Tech carry-on! Lightweight and durable, it features spinner wheels that glide effortlessly through busy airports. Designed just for Macy’s, this is the perfect gift for the frequent flier who wants luggage that performs as well as it looks.
